abstract: Facebook.com, stung last week by the wrath of members who want to sever their relationships, tripped again when it tried to let them do so.

lead_paragraph: Facebook.com, stung last week by the wrath of members who want to sever their relationships, tripped again when it tried to let them do so.

headline.main: After Stumbling, Facebook Finds a Working Eraser
